title: Cinematic Journeys _ Orchestral Music Pack (12 Tracks)
description: An epic cinematic orchestral music pack featuring 12 high-quality tracks. Perfect for games, films, and trailers, covering various themes.
longDescription:
The Cinematic Journeys – Orchestral Music Pack offers 12 high-quality, professionally mastered orchestral tracks designed to enhance your game, film, or trailer. Each track covers a distinct theme, from intense battle sequences to mystical journeys and triumphant victories. Whether you're looking for tension-building background music or heroic anthems, this pack provides versatile compositions to suit various scenes.


Preview: https://on.soundcloud.com/YBx3EXcpZRzgHteGA


Tracklist:

  1. Epic Battle Theme
  2. Mystical Journey
  3. Triumphant Victory
  4. Dark Tension
  5. Hero’s Ascension
  6. Eternal Dawn
  7. The Final Hour
  8. Echoes of the Past
  9. Storm of Fate
  10. Wings of Hope
  11. Veil of Shadows
  12. Rise of Legends

All tracks are delivered in high-quality WAV format, ready for seamless integration into your Unreal Engine project.
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 12

Number of Audio Cues: 12
